oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Rules Database: to support revision of the EU Regulation on organic agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hansen, Jens Grønbech
Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted
Schmid, Otto
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Within the FP6 project, ORGANIC REVISION a public web-based database was implemented to support revision of the EU Regulation on organic agriculture. The database describes differences between the major European organic production standards plus other relevant organic standards (e.g. Codex Alimentarius and IFOAM Basic Standards) in relation to the EEC Reg. 2092/91 (“the EU Regula-tion”) and gives information on areas not yet covered by the EEC Reg. 2092/91. The database at: http://www.organicrules.org, is still under development.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hansen, Jens Grønbech; Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted and Schmid, Otto (2006) Organic Rules Database: to support revision of the EU Regulation on organic agriculture. Poster at: Joint Organic Congress, Odense, Denmark, May 30-31, 2006.
